noun.definition: A completely different line of thought or action
noun.example: He went off on a tangent during the meeting.

noun.definition: A straight line that touches a curve at a single point without crossing it
noun.example: The tangent to the circle was drawn carefully.

adjective.definition: Touching at a single point; hardly relevant or digressing
adjective.example: Her comment was only tangent to the main topic.

usage_examples: He often goes off on tangents while telling a story.
